question: The chart shows budget allocation by department. Which statement is correct according to the chart data?

options.A: R&D has the largest budget among all departments.
options.B: Marketing has the largest budget at 32.5%.
options.C: Sales and Marketing combined receive less than 50% of the budget.
options.D: Operations receives about one-third of Sales' budget.

explanation: Labels show Marketing at 32.5% (largest), so B is correct. The pie slices use visual sizes that don't match the percentagesâ€”R&D's slice appears largest but its actual allocation is only 22.1%, making A a tempting but misleading choice.
